15.1.hd_quote: The ability to confront any challenge without expectations.
15.1.behavioral_axis: Holds steady through extremes without demanding outcomes.

15.2.hd_quote: Modesty and right action result in enduring standards.
15.2.behavioral_axis: Influences by simply living oneâ€™s correct extremes.

15.3.hd_quote: The risk that modesty, once recognized, will self-destruct.
15.3.behavioral_axis: Learns not to game extremism as a tactic.

15.4.hd_quote: Modesty as a shield against exposure of inadequacy.
15.4.behavioral_axis: Feels out of place until environment matches their rhythm.

15.5.hd_quote: The ability to sense when otherwise balanced behavior must be adjusted to meet the requirements of a changing environment.
15.5.behavioral_axis: Adjusts visible extremes to conditions and timing.

15.6.hd_quote: Modesty that is never confused with weakness.
15.6.behavioral_axis: Engages rarely; acts when wisdom serves the pattern.
